trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Whenever you connect to a website, a DNS (domain name system) first turns the domain name (e.g. www.mozilla.org) into an IP address that allows your internet traffic to reach that destination. Typically, your ISP (internet service provider) provides you with a DNS server that your devices use automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quandocunque tu te connecte a un sito web, un DNS (systema de nomine de dominio) primo muta le nomine de dominio (p. ex. www.mozilla.org) in un adresse IP, que permitte a tu traffico internet de attinger ille destination. Typicamente, tu ISP (fornitor de servicio internet) te forni de un servitor de DNS que tu apparatos usa automaticamente.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN allows you to choose a custom DNS server if you prefer. To use a custom DNS, first go to “App preferences”, followed by “DNS settings.” There, you’ll be able to select “Use custom DNS” and enter the one you’d like to use.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN te permitte de eliger un servitor de DNS personalisate si tu prefere. Pro usar un DNS personalisate, primo va a “Preferentias apps”, pois a “Parametros DNS.” Li, tu potera eliger “Usar DNS personalisate” e inserer lo que te placerea usar.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Using a custom DNS is not a perfect solution. If you use one, you won’t be able to use other privacy features in the VPN like tracker blocking. This protection is best used in combination with a browser that also protects your privacy. Like Mozilla Firefox!
trans-unit.target: Usar DNS personalisate non es un solution perfecte. Si tu usa uno, tu non potera usar altere functionalitates de confidentialitate in le VPN como le blocada de traciatores. Iste protection es optimo usate in combination con un navigator que alsi protege tu confidentialitate. Como Mozilla Firefox!

trans-unit.source: Benefits of using a custom DNS
trans-unit.target: Beneficios de usar un DNS personalisate
